properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ndimi mtumishi wako,
nitafurahi kwako Bwana
(mimi)
Ndimi mtumishi wako
nitafurahi kwako Bwana. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nitajongea altare ya Mungu,
Mungu wa raha ya roho yangu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Machoni pangu meza imepabwa,
wanatazama adui zangu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Malishoni mwa majani mabichi,
ananitunza nikiwa naye.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sifa ziende kwa Baba na Mwana,
na kwake Roho milele yote
